attributes.action: BCG vaccinations for all children in Britain regardless of ethnic origin
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to make sure all children in British schools receive the BCG vaccination, as it stands the current law only lets children from a majority of other countries, migrants receive a free BCG vaccination.
TB is a life changing disease and becoming more widespread throughout this country, we need to make sure all children are protected, my daughters school has recently had a confirmed case of TB and yet she is still not entitled to the BCG vaccination, this needs to change!!
